Uses of Class
org.vanted.animation.Animation

Packages that use Animation
Package Description
org.vanted.animation  
org.vanted.animation.animations  

  • Uses of Animation in org.vanted.animation

    Subclasses of Animation in org.vanted.animation
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  ContinuousAnimation<T extends InterpolatableTimePoint>
    Similar to a normal animation but contains an Interpolator so that the animation can transition from one data point value to another data point value in a progressive manner.
    Methods in org.vanted.animation with parameters of type Animation
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Animator.addAnimation​(Animation animation)
    Call this method any time you want to add an animation.
    Can be called while animations are taking place.
    Call it whenever you want.
    void AnimatorAdapter.onAnimationFinished​(AnimatorData data, Animation<TimePoint<T>> anim)  
    void AnimatorListener.onAnimationFinished​(AnimatorData data, Animation<TimePoint<T>> anim)
    Called when an animation is finished.
    void Animator.removeAnimation​(Animation animation)
    Call this method any time you want to remove an animation.
    Can be called while animations are taking place.

  • Uses of Animation in org.vanted.animation.animations

    Subclasses of Animation in org.vanted.animation.animations
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  ArrowSizeAnimation
    Animates the size of an edge arrow
    class  ColorAnimation
    Animates the color of an Attributable object.
    class  FillColorAnimation
    Animates the fill color of an attributable object.
    class  FrameThicknessAnimation
    Animates the frame thickness of a GraphElement object.
    class  HideAnimation  
    class  LabelColorAnimation
    Animates a label's color in a GraphElement object.
    class  LabelTextAnimation  
    class  OpacityAnimation  
    class  OutlineColorAnimation  
    class  Position2DAnimation
    Animates the position of a Node object.
    class  PositionXAnimation
    Animates the x coordinate of a Node object.
    class  PositionYAnimation
    Animates the y coordinate of a Node object.
    class  SizeAnimation
    Animates the size of a Node object.
    class  VisibilityAnimation
    Animates the visibility of an Attributable object.
    BooleanTimePoint data values:
    True = Hidden
    False = Visible
